body: how is this netorare? morons can't even read Japanese, her new boyfriend is a much better guy who genuinely loves her and treat her so kindly despite she clearly still hasn't move on, he even ask her ex for permission before he confess, and I'm so glad the girl finally realize she loves this guy too
This isn't ntr.... Dude breaks up with girl and regrets it when he sees her with a new guy.
...Almost every fuckin tank,story,doujin someone shit out to this fuckin site is fucking NTRASH.What the fuck is wrong with you people? -- MEMBER OF ANTI-NTRASH MOVEMENT --

I posted story on other version but yea ur right its not ntr, but i wouldnt call it vanilla or betrayal, just a bag of mixed emotion. but @gumala is right, I think just because we have the perspective from B-kun we feel he gets the end of the stick and it looks like it sucks for us. Honestly though, I felt like MC was pretty callous and uncaring, or just didn't know what the fuck why he even went in a relationship with A-chan, so Im glad C-kun and A-chan get together. She still had lingering feelings for MC, but her new relationship is definitely more healthy than having an "unrequited" love with MC.

@Fallen_Leaf I mean they're no longer dating, hence the title moto kano, and the story can be summarize as A-chan love B-kun and they started dating, but B-kun isn't that interested in A-chan so they broke up, C-kun who truly love A-chan confess to her and A-chan accept it and they live happily ever after... if that is not vanilla i don't know what is..
@gumala Did you read ? It is not vanilla .. the girl betrayed him ..
why the hell this vanilla shit tagged ntr, this is just your normal life drama, dangit!!
@necrololicon the images on this one have better contrast. The other one looks faded.
